price: And whoever commits a sin, only commits it against himself. And Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
arabic: وَمَن يَكۡسِبۡ إِثۡمٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَكۡسِبُهُۥ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
